text: 20,000 Years in Sing Sing is a 1932 American crime drama movie directed by Michael Curtiz and was based on the nonfiction novel by Lewis E. Lawes. It stars Spencer Tracy, Bette Davis, Arthur Byron, Louis Calhern, Lyle Talbot, Warren Hymer and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. It was remade in 1940 as Castle on the Hudson. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:1932 crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: 20,000 Years in Sing Sing
